definitions: a person, especially a public official, who institutes legal proceedings against someone

examples.text: prosecutors are fully entitled to bring any number of offenses against a single defendant

shortDefinitions: person who institutes legal proceedings against someone

definitions: a lawyer who conducts the case against a defendant in a criminal court. Also called prosecuting attorney

examples.text: the prosecutor rose to give the opening address

shortDefinitions: barrister or other lawyer who conducts case against defendant in criminal court
